key.category.spawn_radar.title: Spawn Radar
option.spawn_radar.title: Spawn Radar
option.spawn_radar.chunk_search_radius.t: Number of chunks (in every direction) scanned when you run /radar.
option.spawn_radar.scan_thread_count.too: Even number of worker threads used for chunk scanning
option.spawn_radar.highlight_after_scan: Automatically highlight cluster active region after scan
Automatically highlight every cluster immediately after a scan finishes.
option.spawn_radar.use_outline_highlight: Use outline rendering for spawner highlights
Draw translucent block outlines instead of solid boxes when highlighting spawners.
option.spawn_radar.show_spawn_volume.too: Show the mob spawn volume overlay by default for highlighted spawners.
option.spawn_radar.show_mob_cap_volume.t: Show the mob-cap check volume overlay by default for highlighted spawners.
option.spawn_radar.show_efficiency_label: Display the calculated efficiency percentage above highlighted spawners.
option.spawn_radar.show_mob_cap_status.t: Show how many mobs are currently inside the mob-cap check volume (for example 3/6).
Show a Spawn Radar reminder about /radar:guide each time you join a compatible world.
option.spawn_radar.outline_thickness.too: Pixel thickness of the outline when outline highlighting is enabled.
option.spawn_radar.frustum_culling.toolt: Skips drawing HUD highlights that are outside your current field of view.
option.spawn_radar.min_spawners.tooltip: Clusters smaller than this value are ignored.
option.spawn_radar.default_cluster_sort_: Sorting applied to newly generated clusters after a scan.
option.spawn_radar.cluster_proximity_sor: Choose whether nearer or farther clusters appear first when sorting by proximity.
option.spawn_radar.cluster_size_sort_ord: Choose whether smaller or larger clusters appear first when sorting by size.
option.spawn_radar.background_processing: Scan new chunks for spawners as they load and raise alerts for promising clusters.
option.spawn_radar.use_cached_spawners.t: Reuse spawners discovered during background chunk processing instead of rescanning when you run /radar:scan.
option.spawn_radar.auto_highlight_alerts: After a scan, automatically highlight any clusters that previously triggered a background alert.
option.spawn_radar.background_alert_thre: Minimum number of nearby spawners required before a background alert is raised.
Maximum distance between spawners that counts toward a background alert.
option.spawn_radar.panel_element_count.t: Number of cluster rows rendered on each HUD page.
option.spawn_radar.panel_vertical_offset: Moves the HUD panel up or down as a percentage of screen height.
option.spawn_radar.panel_horizontal_alig: Anchors the HUD panel to the left or right edge of the screen.
option.spawn_radar.spawner_icon_mode.too: Choose whether the HUD shows each spawner as a 3D mob or its spawn egg.
chat.spawn_radar.none: No spawners found in the scanned area.
chat.spawn_radar.show_spawners_hover: Show all spawners in this cluster
chat.spawn_radar.invalid_id_number: Invalid cluster ID. Use a number or 'all'.
chat.spawn_radar.reset: Reset block bank and spawner data.
chat.spawn_radar.disabled: Spawn Radar is disabled on this server.
chat.spawn_radar.cluster_alert: Found a cluster with %1$s spawners nearby. Consider running /radar:scan.
chat.spawn_radar.welcome: You have Spawn Radar %s installed! Run /radar:guide to open the usage guide. Disable this reminder in the config if you prefer.
command.spawn_radar.teleport_hover: Click to teleport to this spawner
command.spawn_radar.scan.suggestion.prox: Sort clusters by how close they are to you.
command.spawn_radar.scan.suggestion.size: Sort clusters by how many spawners they contain.
command.spawn_radar.help.scan.title: Scan for Spawners
command.spawn_radar.help.scan: Generate clusters by scanning around you. Accepts optional sorting and radius arguments.
command.spawn_radar.help.scan.detail: Add 'manual' after /radar:scan to force a fresh chunk scan (ignores cached data). Arguments: sorting (proximity|size) controls ordering; radius (1-256) overrides the configured default distance.
command.spawn_radar.help.toggle.title: Toggle Highlights
command.spawn_radar.help.toggle: Toggle a specific cluster highlight or all clusters at once.
command.spawn_radar.help.toggle.detail: Argument target: a cluster id (number) or 'all' to toggle every cluster.
command.spawn_radar.help.info.title: List Spawners
command.spawn_radar.help.info: List every spawner in a cluster with clickable teleport shortcuts.
command.spawn_radar.help.info.detail: Argument id: cluster number between 1 and the current cluster count.
command.spawn_radar.help.reset.title: Reset Data
command.spawn_radar.help.reset: Clear block bank, clusters and highlights.
command.spawn_radar.help.reset.detail: No arguments. Immediately wipes previously scanned data and HUD highlights.
command.spawn_radar.help.misc: Tip: use /radar help <command> for details or /radar help to list every command.
command.spawn_radar.help.unknown: Unknown help topic '%s'. Try one of: scan, toggle, info, reset.
command.spawn_radar.info.toggle_hover: Click to toggle this cluster highlight.
text.spawn_radar.efficiency_advisor.volu:
Only %s%% of the spawn volume is open.
Remove blocks, trapdoors, water, and slabs inside the highlighted volume so mobs have valid positions.
text.spawn_radar.efficiency_advisor.ligh:
Darkness is only %s%% inside the spawn area.
Break or cover light sources and block skylight so the volume reaches light level 0.
text.spawn_radar.efficiency_advisor.mobc:
The mob cap contains %s mobs.
Kill or move mobs outside the 8-block cube so the spawner can run again.

The mob cap is currently %s.
Move or remove mobs near the spawner to regain headroom and raise efficiency.
